Thalia Brito

I am a...

I'm a freelance web designer and developer based in Jersey City, NJ. I got my bachelor's in Computer Science from Rutgers New Brunswick. So I know how to code and can tell you want asymptoptic notation means. I looked to web development because I liked the appeal of design, code, and communicating ideas with people. Though my design skills weren't always the best (we're talking squiggly lines and geometric shapes), I always aspired to do better. So one year and many hideous custom built websites later, I finally began to see results. User experience is key to a successful website. My focus is always on creating a balance between design and functionality. As someone with elderly parents, the motto for good UI design "don't make me think" has never rung truer. When I'm not coding or learning some new trendy front-end framework, I'm either lounging on my couch or binge-reading anything by Ilona Andrews.
